body:
・I changed 0 to nullptr because I got following error when installing gmodel.
`error: zero as null pointer constant [-Werror,-Wzero-as-null-pointer-constant]`

・I deleted function template because  I got following error when installing gmodel.
`error: unused function template 'size' [-Werror,-Wunused-template]`

・Ref: https://github.com/ibaned/gmodel/commit/6b81ec190cf2ce9a6554a99cb6d759b023393cdd
title: gmodel: Fix various errors during build
